solution_line_template: Each minute last {seconds_per_minute} seconds, so that means for the fries to be fully cooked Bill needs to cook them for {recommended_minutes}*{seconds_per_minute}=<<{recommended_minutes}*{seconds_per_minute}={total_cook_seconds}>>{total_cook_seconds} seconds

Since Bill had the fries in the oven for {seconds_cooked} seconds so far, that means they need to stay in the oven for another {total_cook_seconds}-{seconds_cooked}= <<{total_cook_seconds}-{seconds_cooked}={seconds_remaining}>>{seconds_remaining} seconds.
